import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline
source.0621341e:
plt.figure(dpi=100)
plt.title('Correlation Analysis')
sns.heatmap(df.corr(),annot=True,lw=1,linecolor='white',cmap='viridis')
plt.xticks(rotation=60)
plt.yticks(rotation = 60)
plt.show()
source.0173d106:
corr = df.corr()
mask = np.triu(np.ones_like(corr,dtype = bool))

plt.figure(dpi=100)
plt.title('Correlation Analysis')
sns.heatmap(df.corr(),mask=mask,annot=True,lw=1,linecolor='white',cmap='viridis')
plt.xticks(rotation=60)
plt.yticks(rotation = 60)
plt.show()
source.5df83cac: **Let us remove some unnecessary information by creating a good representative correlation map.**
